sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>inactive</active> <available_version>0.1</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.test_mgmt" name="Test Management" version="0.1" state="published" provider_name="ServiceNow" help="CSHelp:Test_Management" licensable="true" license_model="producer"> <requires> <import plugin="com.snc.planned_task_v2"/> </requires> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="TestManagmentUtil" class="com.snc.test_mgmt.TestManagmentUtil" /> <description>Plugin for supporting test management in IT projects.</description> </plugin>]]></definition> <description>Plugin for supporting test management in IT projects.</description> <has_demo_data>true</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=CSHelp:Test_Management</help> <id>com.snc.test_mgmt</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>Test Management</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.test_mgmt/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.snc.planned_task_v2</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.snc.test_mgmt</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type/> <version>0.1</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
